name: Coots and the Dungeon of Doom
name_original: Coots and the Dungeon of Doom
description:
Play as Coots the Brave on your journey into the Dungeon of Doom to save your Lord and Lady... unless they were never there to begin with. Either way, you must explore its depths to be sure. Good luck, it's dangerous.

Coots and the Dungeon of Doom is a roguelike rpg made for the Ludwig Game Jam 2023. Filled with enemies to fight, and treasure to find, it is an endless delve into the dungeon.
